channel.title: Geek News Central Audio
channel.description: Talking tech for the common man. With a twice weekly tech show covering a wide range of technical issues. A Top Tech Podcasts and home of the Author of Podcasting The Do it Yourself Guide Visit Geek News Central at geeknewscentral.com
channel.itunes:summary: This technology show hosted by Todd Cochrane a Pioneer in the Podcasting space, focuses on technology, science and New Media. Tech News for the common man, join his 175,000+ family of satisfied listeners viewers. Every show is a learning experience covering all things tech so you do not have to. One of the first 100 podcasters his show is a must listen. Author of the first book on podcasting and the CEO behind RawVoice the New Media company representing 19000 new media creators!

channel.itunes:subtitle: Tech, Science, New Media and more from a Pioneer in Podcasting
channel.googleplay:description: Geek News Central is a twice weekly tech show that covers everything happening in the tech and science world. Hosted by Podcast Hall of Fame Inductee Todd Cochrane. The show in it's 11th year of production is released every Tuesday and Friday morning.

Best Audience in the Universe #1245
item.content:encoded:
Big news on the show today. You all are the best audience in the universe. Sadly since the switch to the 1GB connection with Spectrum, my Internet service has been worse. They were not ready for this in prime time here in Oahu. It’s beyond frustrating the livestream failed tonight and I never had stream failures on the previous slower connection. It really makes no sense. There is no recourse at this point so I will just have to tough it out till Hawaiian Telcom brings 1gb to my area in Q1 2018

You have heard me talk about proximity beacons. I know now how to do it with minimal investment! This course that I endorse and have used successfully is the gateway to deploying proximity beacons for Android.
